solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isPalindrome(int x) {--newline--        if (x<0 || (x!=0 && x%10==0)) return false;--newline--        int rev = 0;--newline--        while (x>rev){--newline--            rev = rev*10 + x%10;--newline--            x = x/10;--newline--        }--newline--        return (x==rev || x==rev/10);--newline--    }--newline--}
